text: The Bloody Farm (Turkish: Kanlı Çiftlik) is a 1953 Turkish drama film directed by Faruk Kenç.Gökmen p.83 ==Cast== * Belgin Doruk * Mahir Özerdem * Bülent Ufuk * Vedat Karaokçu * Mine Coskun * Zeki Alpan * Ali Üstüntas * Zihni Rona * Aliye Rona * Necmi Büken * Cemal Karakas * Kadir Savun ==References== ==Bibliography== * Mustafa Gökmen. Eski İstanbul sinemaları. İstanbul Kitaplığı Yayınları, 1991. ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:1953 drama films Category:Turkish-language films Category:Turkish films Category:Turkish drama films
title: The Bloody Farm
